Banner.Description: I'm working on building high quality products on Web 3.0 and The Metaverse. I'm hoping to be able to bring these new and exciting technologies to millions of people and hopefully be able to improve their lives in some way or another.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: Being a blockchain developer forces me to be a continous learner as the space moves much quicker than my knowledge about it. However, I find learning as one of the biggest pleasures in my life along with doing exercise, playing videogames and spending time with my family and friends.
I also have experience developing traditional finance systems for wholesale banking and data reconciliation scripts.
I love working with new and disruptive technologies that have the power to change how we interact with money, things and people.
Some of the technologies that I have used include:
Experience.Title: Studies & Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Computer Engineering
Description: Engineering degree taken at Universidad de Alcalá, a Spanish public university.

The most challenging 4 years of my life, in which I developed a great variety of projects, some of which include a self-driving car controller using ADA and the TORCS simulator, a compiler for a custom programming language written in Java and a fast-food restaurant app using Android Studio.

As my final degree project, I developed a prototype on FreeRTOS and RISC-V of the application software of the EPD ICU onboard Solar Orbiter. The EPD ICU is a device used to measure the solar wind and the magnetic field of the Sun and it's mounted on Solar Orbiter, a mission of the European Space Agency.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Consultant
Description: Development and maintenance of wholesale banking systems for BBVA, a Spanish multinational bank.
Developed frontend systems using Java, Kotlin and PHP.
Creation of data reconciliation scripts using Python and Pandas.
MySQL, Oracle, Bitbucket, Jira, Jenkins, Unix etc.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Master's Degree in Blockchain
Description: Master's degree taken at Universidad Europea, a prestigious Spanish private university.
Learnt how to develop blockchain systems using Solidity and deploying them on various EVM-compatible blockchains such as Ethereum, Polygon and Avalanche.
Created nodes of the main blockchain networks such as Bitcoin, Ethereum and Hyperledger Fabric.
My final master's degree project was Gastroo, a Web 3.0 Dapp that allows foodies to monetize their culinary contents by creating NFTs with their recipees embedded into them.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Blockchain developer
Description: Development of the CryptoAvatars project. A Web 3.0 marketplace where anyone can buy tokenized avatars ready for multiple metaverses EVM-compatible blockchains.
Development of the CA-Marketplace smart contract, integration of frontend and backend systems with the supported chains.
Working in a 10 person Scrum team
Hardhat, Solidity, Typescript, Ethers.js, Angular, Nest.js, OpenZeppelin, Metamask.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Agrourbana
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Monitoring application made from scratch with auth module, configurable graphics, configurable alarms, and user management. It also has feedback form logic for parameter configuration.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Health plan quote that has a search engine with which advanced queries are made. Plans are displayed based on the user's age, monthly income, and location. It has online chatcontact form, notification system by whatsapp and mail, auth, and internet information management through the role of administrator.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Data monitoring platform belonging to water wells, tugboats, and various installations made from scratch with auth module, configurable graphics, configurable alarms, user management, and geolocation with openlayers.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: The rock-paper-scissors game extended. A personal project developed in angular in which you play randomly against the machine. It has the use of services, interfaces, and components.
